{{Wired embedded system |brand=Intrinsyc |model=CerfCube |manuf_country=Canada |is_manuf=Yes |price=379 |est_release_date=05/2001 |type=web server, wired embedded board |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2.4 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=3.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=1.3 |cpu1_brand=Intel StrongARM |cpu1_model=SA-1110 (GDS1110BC);GDS1110BC, SA-1110, StrongARM (ARM @192MHz); |cpu1_cspeed=192 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Intel |fla1_model=E28F128-J3A150 |fla2=340 |fla2_brand=IBM |fla2_model=MicroDrive |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Micron |ram1_model=MT48LC8M16A2-75B |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 1.1 (slave) |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag=yes,, 7-pin header,, populated,, J3 |serial=yes,, console port,, DE-9,, (38400 8N1) |eth_chip1_brand=Crystal |eth_chip1_model=CS8900A;CS8900A-CQ; |lan_speed=10M |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=4K-bit 3-Wire Serial EEPROM;Atmel;AT93C66;;1;,,, Dual Output Low-Dropout Voltage Regulator;TI;TPS767D301;;1;,,, Hex Inverter w/ Schmitt Trigger Input;Fairchild;74LVX14;;1;,,, 3.3V-5V RS232 3-Driver/5-Receiver Transceiver;Linear Technology;LTC1348;;1;,,, Quad 2-Input OR Gate;Fairchild;74LVX32;;1; |flags=CompactFlash, UART, GPIO, metal case, |stock_boot=Iboot;1.1.1; |stock_os=Windows;Embedded CE; |tp_firmware=Linux |default_ip=192.168.0.100 |oui_eth=00:D0:CA }} {{TagLine|Intrinsyc CerfCube - WebServer}}
===News=== *[https://linuxdevices.org/honey-i-shrunk-the-linux-system-a/ ''Honey, I shrunk the Linux system'' on '''LinuxDevices''' archive] *[http://www.davespda.com/reviews/cerfcube.htm ''Intrinsyc CerfCube'' on '''Dave's PDA Place''']
===Specifications=== *CPU: ''[[Intel StrongARM]]'' SA-1110 :ARM @192MHz (GDS1110BC) *RAM: 32MB (DR SDRAM) *Storage: 16MB (NOR) flash, :340MB [[Intel]] CFII+ MicroDrive *Network: 1x 10M Ethernet *USB: 1x USB 1.1 port *Power: 5V/2.4A barrel plug *Dimensions (L x W x H): 3 x 3 x 3"
===See also=== *[[ASUS WL-500]] • [[Intel StrongARM]] GDS1110BD (@206MHz) *[[Intrinsyc CerfBoard 255]] • [[Intel XScale]] PXA255 (@400MHz) *[[Intrinsyc CerfCube]] • [[Intel StrongARM]] GDS1110BC (@192MHz) *[[Intrinsyc CerfCube 405EP]] • [[AMCC]]/[[IBM]] PowerPC 405EP ([https://www.ixbt.com/news/hard/index.shtml?00/72/07 802.11b, BT]) *[[Intrinsyc CerfPod]] • [[Intel StrongARM]] GDS1110BC (@192MHz) <!-- 32MB RAM, 16MB Flash -->([https://people.apache.org/~jim/NewArchitect/webtech/2001/10/infrrevu/index.html Spec.]) *[[Rebel Netwinder OfficeServer]] • [[Intel StrongARM]] SA-110 (@233MHz) *[[CompuLab 486CORE]] (SBC) • [[AMD]] ElanSC400 CPU • [https://linuxdevices.org/worlds-smallest-embedded-pc-sbc/ PR]
